snippet: Nordstrom and J.C. Penney were among several retailers whose shares were slumping as investors worried about the holiday shopping season.
abstract: Stocks tumble to second-biggest weekly loss of year, as fears lurk over weak holiday retail sales.
lead_paragraph: Nordstrom and J.C. Penney were among several retailers whose shares were slumping as investors worried about the holiday shopping season.

headline.main: Concerns Over the Retail Industry Drive the Market Down
headline.print_headline: Shares Slide Over Worries About Holiday Retail Season
